name: AzureTestPlan
description: Run manual and automated tests points of test plan for different testing frameworks like Maven and Gradle for Java, PyTest for Python and Jest for JavaScript
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Resource Manager connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure Resource Manager service connection

inputs.name: testSelector
inputs.label: Test cases to be executed
inputs.helpMarkDown:
• Manual tests: Use this option to trigger manual tests from your test plan.
  • Automated tests: Use this option to run tests from your test plan that have automated test method associated with it.

inputs.name: testPlanOrRunSelector
inputs.label: Select tests using
inputs.helpMarkDown:
• Test assembly: Use this option to specify one or more test assemblies that contain your tests. You can optionally specify a filter criteria to select only specific tests.
  • Test plan: Use this option to run tests from your test plan that have an automated test method associated with it.
  • Test run: Use this option when you are setting up an environment to run tests from the Test hub. This option should not be used when running tests in a continuous integration / continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline.

inputs.name: testRunId
inputs.label: Test Run
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test run based selection is used when triggering automated test runs from the test hub, value for this should be kept as it is

inputs.name: testPlan
inputs.label: Test plan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type or paste the test plan ID containing test suites with test cases.

inputs.name: testSuite
inputs.label: Test suite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select one or more test suites containing test cases.

inputs.name: testLanguageInput
inputs.label: Select Test framework language
inputs.helpMarkDown: Test Framework Language of automated tests in test plan

inputs.name: pomFilePath
inputs.label: Pom file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repository root to the Maven POM file.

inputs.name: gradleFilePath
inputs.label: Gradle file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from the repository root to the build.gradle file.

inputs.name: publishRunAttachments
inputs.label: Upload test results files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Upload logs and other files containing diagnostic information collected when the tests were run.

inputs.name: failTaskOnFailedTests
inputs.label: Fail if there are test failures
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail the task if there are any test failures. Check this option to fail the task if test failures are detected in the result files.

inputs.name: failTaskOnFailureToPublishResults
inputs.label: Fail if there is failure in publishing test results
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail if there is failure in publishing test results. Check this option to fail the task if publishing test results is failed partially.

inputs.name: failTaskOnMissingResultsFile
inputs.label: Fail if no result files are found
inputs.helpMarkDown: Fail the task if no result files are found.
